name: Magical Bullets
description:
I choose to make one of my favorite game genres of all time: Rail Shooters. It was fun to develop this game on Unity, even with the short time for development (<= 24hours). Maybe I will continue, because I have some things unfinshed:

1. I have implemented a simple but cute dialogue system who need to see the world.

2. More enemys ? Hell yeah. My babys are cute, but I need more cute things to kill.

3. Better menu. Yeap. I know, I'm just lazy.

I have to thank some people on the internet:

  • Lemonjolly for the sfx
  • Reitanna for the sfx
  • Sirkot for the stage music
  • Boxophobic for the skybox
  • BitGem for the trees
    • So Thank You!
